summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5289 for the improvement of Constance Drive, from Parkmont Place to West Viewmont Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 61148, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
